overview: A compilation beginning with Yonaha Maehama Beach, known as the whitest sandy beach in all of the orient, then to the famous natural arch of renowned Sunayama (Sand Hill) Beach, as well as the shallow and beautiful emerald green ocean that opens up from Toguchi Bay are just a sampling of more to come.
tagline: Pursuing the upper limits of 4K, HDR (High Dynamic Range), and High Resolution imagery presentation.
title: Miyako Island - Healing Beach
